name: Brawl Stars (Scratch Edition)
description:
-Aim and shoot with the mouse.

-Move with: W,A,S,D.

-Change Brawler in practice mode : B

------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Mini Box=Coins(10),Gems(5),Tickets(2)
-Big Box=Coins(10),Gems(5),Tickets(2),Star Points(6)
-Mega Box=Coins(100),Gems(50),Tickets(20),Star Points(60)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-10 Trophies=Nita
-20 Trophies=Colt
-30 Trophies=1500 Coins
-40 Trophies=Bull
-55 Trophies=Jessie
